resources.string: Michel\'s purpose is to activate people\'s love for the ocean and unleash their potential to take action. As an Avid sea turtle, he has been surfind for 10 at beaches across the world. He has worked with Sea Turtles Forever for the past 8 years (4 of them on their Board of Directors). Learn more about his personal ocean experience creation work at www.surfani.com .

Join Michael and your fellow surfers at the Traveler Surf and Swim Club, where you will kick off the day with a reflective discussion on our individual relationshop with the ocean. The we will grab our Traveler boards and head out to the waves, where Michael will guide you through surfing basics and show you how to ride the waves.

Wetsuit, surfboard
send your height before arriving

Granola Bars
